content.raw: Some NI cards don't have Analog outputs. If you set `num_AO` to be 0 the BLACS worker crashes saying it can't start the ao task with no outputs. This can be caught with some simple ifs. I'm not sure if there are cards that don't have digital outs but we might want to add some if clauses there as well just in case
content.html: Some NI cards don't have Analog outputs. If you set num_AO to be 0 the BLACS worker crashes saying it can't start the ao task with no outputs. This can be caught with some simple ifs. I'm not sure if there are cards that don't have digital outs but we might want to add some if clauses there as well just in case
